document.full_text: following weeks of debate and national attention, florida governor rick scott on thursday signed into law a measure that will end tenure for new public school teachers and base pay more directly on student test scores.
document.title: florida law backs merit pay, ends tenure for new teachers
lines_and_colors: following weeks of debate and national attention, florida governor rick scott on thursday signed into law a measure that will end tenure for new public school teachers and base pay more directly on student test scores.
